verses.arabic: وَٱلذَّ ٰ⁠رِیَـٰتِ ذَرۡوࣰا
verses.translation: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing

verses.arabic: فَٱلۡحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقۡرࣰا
verses.translation: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

verses.arabic: فَٱلۡجَـٰرِیَـٰتِ یُسۡرࣰا
verses.translation: And those [ships] sailing with ease

verses.arabic: فَٱلۡمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمۡرًا
verses.translation: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقࣱ
verses.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّینَ لَوَ ٰ⁠قِعࣱ
verses.translation: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡحُبُكِ
verses.translation: By the heaven containing pathways,

verses.arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ لَفِی قَوۡلࣲ مُّخۡتَلِفࣲ
verses.translation: Indeed, you are in differing speech.

verses.arabic: یُؤۡفَكُ عَنۡهُ مَنۡ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.

verses.arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلۡخَرَّ ٰ⁠صُونَ
verses.translation: Destroyed are the falsifiers

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ فِی غَمۡرَةࣲ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.

verses.arabic: یَسۡـَٔلُونَ أَیَّانَ یَوۡمُ ٱلدِّینِ
verses.translation: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"

verses.arabic: یَوۡمَ هُمۡ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ یُفۡتَنُونَ
verses.translation: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire

verses.arabic: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِی كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
verses.translation: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ فِی جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَعُیُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,

verses.arabic: ءَاخِذِینَ مَاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ قَبۡلَ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ مُحۡسِنِینَ
verses.translation: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.

verses.arabic: كَانُوا۟ قَلِیلࣰا مِّنَ ٱلَّیۡلِ مَا یَهۡجَعُونَ
verses.translation: They used to sleep but little of the night,

verses.arabic: وَبِٱلۡأَسۡحَارِ هُمۡ یَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,

verses.arabic: وَفِیۤ أَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِهِمۡ حَقࣱّ لِّلسَّاۤىِٕلِ وَٱلۡمَحۡرُومِ
verses.translation: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.

verses.arabic: وَفِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ءَایَـٰتࣱ لِّلۡمُوقِنِینَ
verses.translation: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

verses.arabic: وَفِیۤ أَنفُسِكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?

verses.arabic: وَفِی ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ رِزۡقُكُمۡ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.

verses.arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقࣱّ مِّثۡلَ مَاۤ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.

verses.arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِیثُ ضَیۡفِ إِبۡرَ ٰ⁠هِیمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِینَ
verses.translation: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -

verses.arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَیۡهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمࣰاۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمࣱ قَوۡمࣱ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.

verses.arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰۤ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَاۤءَ بِعِجۡلࣲ سَمِینࣲ
verses.translation: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

verses.arabic: فَقَرَّبَهُۥۤ إِلَیۡهِمۡ قَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"

verses.arabic: فَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِیفَةࣰۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفۡۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِیمࣲ
verses.translation: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.

verses.arabic: فَأَقۡبَلَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ فِی صَرَّةࣲ فَصَكَّتۡ وَجۡهَهَا وَقَالَتۡ عَجُوزٌ عَقِیمࣱ
verses.translation: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِیمُ ٱلۡعَلِیمُ
verses.translation: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."

verses.arabic: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكُمۡ أَیُّهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّاۤ أُرۡسِلۡنَاۤ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمࣲ مُّجۡرِمِینَ
verses.translation: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

verses.arabic: لِنُرۡسِلَ عَلَیۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةࣰ مِّن طِینࣲ
verses.translation: To send down upon them stones of clay,

verses.arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِینَ
verses.translation: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."

verses.arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِیهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ
verses.translation: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.

verses.arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِیهَا غَیۡرَ بَیۡتࣲ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِینَ
verses.translation: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.

verses.arabic: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِیهَاۤ ءَایَةࣰ لِّلَّذِینَ یَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِیمَ
verses.translation: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

verses.arabic: وَفِی مُوسَىٰۤ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَـٰنࣲ مُّبِینࣲ
verses.translation: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونࣱ
verses.translation: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَـٰهُمۡ فِی ٱلۡیَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِیمࣱ
verses.translation: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.

verses.arabic: وَفِی عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلرِّیحَ ٱلۡعَقِیمَ
verses.translation: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

verses.arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَیۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَیۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِیمِ
verses.translation: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.

verses.arabic: وَفِی ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِیلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِینࣲ
verses.translation: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

verses.arabic: فَعَتَوۡا۟ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ یَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.

verses.arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِیَامࣲ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِینَ
verses.translation: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.

verses.arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحࣲ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ قَوۡمࣰا فَـٰسِقِینَ
verses.translation: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءَ بَنَیۡنَـٰهَا بِأَیۡی۟دࣲ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

verses.arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَرَشۡنَـٰهَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَـٰهِدُونَ
verses.translation: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.

verses.arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَیۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَیۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.

verses.arabic: فَفِرُّوۤا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّی لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِیرࣱ مُّبِینࣱ
verses.translation: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّی لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِیرࣱ مُّبِینࣱ
verses.translation: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

verses.arabic: كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ مَاۤ أَتَى ٱلَّذِینَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ
verses.translation: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."

verses.arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمࣱ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ فَمَاۤ أَنتَ بِمَلُومࣲ
verses.translation: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.

verses.arabic: وَذَكِّرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ
verses.translation: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِیَعۡبُدُونِ
verses.translation: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

verses.arabic: مَاۤ أُرِیدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقࣲ وَمَاۤ أُرِیدُ أَن یُطۡعِمُونِ
verses.translation: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِینُ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِینَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبࣰا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَـٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا یَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
verses.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.

verses.arabic: فَوَیۡلࣱ لِّلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن یَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِی یُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.
